name: Venomed Soul
text: You are a venomed soul, a student of an ancient text called The Book of All Venoms. Zehir wrote this book at the dawn of creation, and within its pages he outlined the invention of every poison that is, was, and ever shall be. Over the centuries, several thieves have stolen fragments of the book, from adventurers desperate to find a poisonâ€™s antidote to ambitious slayers eager to unleash poison so powerful that even Zehir balked at crafting them.

features.masterOfPoisons(11thLevel): Whenever you take a short or an extended rest, you can poison one of your weapons or a piece of ammunition
features.venomousAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you gain a bonus to attack rolls equal to your Constitution modifier against enemies taking ongoing poison damage
features.persistentVenom(16thLevel): The poison effect of your Master of Poisons is no longer lost on a miss

flavorText: One cut is all I need to end your life.
